name: Fighter Panda ( TOP 3D Angry Kung fu Panda Shootin
name_original: Fighter Panda ( TOP 3D Angry Kung fu Panda Shootin
description:
=====================================
This is a full version game with 20+ Long Levels.
======================================

Deep in the jungles of ancient china there lived a mysterious martial arts grand master. Men travelled to him from every deep ravine as did the animals to learn this ancient art. Before he died, he gave the title of "Dragon Fighter" to a Panda, who was his favourite student.

Neither anyone liked the idea nor they were ready to accept a panda as their master.

When the grand master died, all of his students, from the most furious to the mildest rebelled against their New Dragon fighter.

They made some of the most dangerous traps which would kill the most furious of the fighters in no time.

The dragon house of the dragon warrior which would only open when all the dragon coins are used as the key is now close, as his enemies stole the dragon coins from him and hid them in the jungle.

The world once again want the Panda to prove himself as "THE DRAGON FIGHTER".

The ANGRY PANDA had only two paths in front of him, save his life and run away from the jungle or fight to reclaim the tittle he deserved.

Thanks to the training, the Angry Panda is not giving up and now he is very ANGGGRYYYYY...

His Master said:
If you can trust yourself when all men doubt you,
But make allowance for their doubting too;
..........
And Yes Be that Panda, FIGHT ! reclaim your RIGHT but only if you dare !!!...
